# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper mining structure at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0, y=-80.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) with status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL

### Copper mining structure at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS

### Electricity generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5) with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) with status EntityStatus.EMPTY
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5) with status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668) with status EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

### Transport belt structure at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
- Check the status of these entities to identify which ones are lacking fuel.

### Errors due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.
- Check the status of stone furnaces to identify which ones are missing ingredients.

### Errors due to disconnection from the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network to operate.
- Check the status of steam engines to identify which ones are not connected.

### Errors due to empty or full pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are properly connected and have a sufficient fluid supply to operate.
- Check the status of pipe groups to identify which ones are empty or full.

### Errors due to waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a sufficient source of items to operate.
- Check the status of burner inserters to identify which ones are waiting for source items.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables have been defined or assigned in the provided execution logs.
